marklogic.body:
Free speech does not mean that somebody has to provide others with a platform through which they may spout Off. If you want to stand on the street corner, you can exercise you r free speech until the cows come home. You are not, however, entitled to a TV show, a radio show or - yes - even a Spot as an editorial artist.
BTW, has anyone looked at Eisner's prior output? Can't make heads or tails out of most of her previous cartoons.
Still, seems like a good egg and it IS unfortunate that the paper let her go.
